name: SuperPlanets
description:
Welcome to my new skill-based game, currently in alpha version, available on itch.io.

In this fast-paced game made with Unity, your goal is to navigate through obstacles and challenges, while collecting points and power-ups along the way. With intuitive controls and a dynamic game-play, you'll find yourself hooked from the start.

As this is an alpha version, I'm looking for feedback, advice, and opinions to help me improve the game. So, please don't hesitate to let me know what you think! Your feedback will be valuable in shaping the final version of the game.

Thank you for testing prototype.
